basics.name: Robert Norberg
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: Robert is a well rounded data scientist that brings a combination of technical know-how, practicality, and relentless enthusiasm to all of his work.

location.address: 3737 St Johns Bluff Rd S; Apt 211

work.summary: Designed and built an analytics-as-a-service product for outbound consumer contact centers
highlights: Architected and built a platform for data exchange and storage, customized predictive model training, individual and batch model-as-a-service predictions, and dashboard visualizations

work.summary: Member health and quality of care analytics
highlights: Developed a multitenant application for tracking, forecasting, and optimizing Medicare Stars ratings
Used web, demographic, and other unconventional data sources to forecast member health and utilization
Built an automated analysis pipeline for determining return on investment from observational data

work.summary: Responsible for all aspects of teaching introductory statistics to classes of approximately 60 undergraduates
Cleaned, combined, and analyzed sensor data from over a dozen sources in support of environmental research
highlights: Produced research that informed environmental policy legislated by the US Environmental Protection Agency

education.institution: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

awards.title: EverBank Data Mining Contest
awards.summary: Placed third in a data mining competition with entrants from all major universities in Florida
